translation.en: [woman] So, we took a look at your CT scans. [Michael] Mm-hmm.
[woman] And we do see a large mass in your stomach
as well as several lesions on your liver.
At this point, I recommend that you see a specialist,
and I can help you with a recommendation and get you a list of people.
translation.ko: 진료 의뢰서를 써드릴게요 전문의도 몇 명 소개해 드리고요

translation.en: -So, you think it's bad? -We don't really know,
which is why I think it's important for you to see a specialist.
He'll do a biopsy, more tests and...
translation.ko: 조직 검사도 하고 몇 가지 검사를 더 하면...

translation.en: What do you think though? What do you think about it?
translation.ko: 무슨 병 같은 데요? 당신 의견은 뭐죠?

translation.en: You've seen it and all. What do you think?
-Do you know how bad it is? -At this point, I don't really know.
translation.ko: - 얼마나 심각한지 아세요? - 저희는 정말 몰라요

translation.en: But you can tell us something, right? Can you tell us something?
translation.ko: 그래도 뭔가 말해줄 수 있잖아요 그렇죠? 얘기해줄 수 있어요?

translation.en: -[Andy] Don't you have to say-- -It's okay.
I think... I think... How about... All right, listen. How about this? How about I'm gonna make a statement?
translation.ko: 이렇게 하면 어때요? 내가 얘기를 할 테니

translation.en: And if it's a true statement, you don't have to correct me.
translation.ko: 내 말이 맞으면 정정할 필요가 없다면

translation.en: And you don't have to say anything to me.
Okay? So is what Michael has...
Dude, that's a question. You gotta... It has to be--
It has to be a statement. All right.
Do you understand the game? 'Cause you're not saying anything.
translation.ko: 어떻게 하는 건지 알겠죠? 아무 말도 하지 않는군요

translation.en: I don't know if that's... I don't know...
if that's cause you understand what we...
Did you see All the President's Men?
Um, remind me of your relationship. How do you know each other?
translation.ko: 두 분 어떤 관계라고요? 어떻게 아는 사이세요?

translation.en: [Andy] There's still shit in the bottom of this. [Michael] Yeah, there is.
translation.ko: - 바닥에 아직 쓰레기가 있어 - 그래, 있지

translation.en: [Andy] It's gross. I'm not reaching in there. [Michael] I know. I'll get it.
translation.ko: - 더러워, 난 안 만질 거야 - 알았어, 내가 꺼낼게

translation.en: [Andy] And the ball's gonna be gross.
-[Michael] Okay. Did you serve yesterday? -[Andy] Yeah. Yeah, it's your serve.
translation.ko: - 어제 자네가 서브했던가? - 응 그럼, 자네가 서브해 잠깐만
그럼, 자네가 서브해 잠깐만 "밸리 드라이브인 극장"

translation.en: -What happened with the specialist guy? -He was special.
I'll... tell you what happened at lunch today.
translation.ko: 오늘... 점심 시간에 있었던 일 얘기해 줄게

translation.en: I was at the diner next to my office.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일? - 식당에 있었어 - 사무실 옆에 있는 거 말이야 - 그래
- 사무실 옆에 있는 거 말이야 - 그래

translation.en: I had that booth by the window, and...
this guy floats by the window. Guy just floats by the window.
translation.ko: 한 남자가 창 옆으로 둥둥 떠서 가던데

translation.en: I mean, he floats. I mean, I just see... I can't see his bottom. Yeah.
translation.ko: - 둥둥 떠가니까 하체가 안 보였어 - 그래

translation.en: His bottom ain't moving. You can tell he's not moving. You know...
-He was probably on a hover board. -Skateboard?
translation.ko: - 호버 보드 타고 있었나 보지 - 스케이트 보드 같은 거?

translation.en: No, that... You know, those things those kids do. They put it on their feet--
translation.ko: 아니, 애들이 타는 거 있잖아 다리 올려놓고...

translation.en: Yeah, I know he was on a hover board but it just started me thinking.
translation.ko: 그래, 호버 보드인 줄 나도 알아 근데 생각하게 만들더라고
호버 보드 타는 남자를 봤다는 거지

translation.en: Can you imagine that? That would screw up your whole life.
translation.ko: 근데 그게 네 인생을 망칠 수도 있다고 상상해 봐
그 사람이 보드 탔는데? 그게 뭐?

translation.en: If you saw a guy hover, so what?
translation.ko: 호버 보드 타는 남자를 봤다는데 그게 뭐 어떠냐고?
그래, 남자가 그냥 보드 탄 거잖아

translation.en: So, life's normal for you right after that?
translation.ko: 그러니까 그날 이후로 네 인생이 정상이란 말이야?

translation.en: I don't have a problem with it.
So, all rules of reality, thousands of years of science,
translation.ko: 현실의 모든 규칙들, 수천 년의 과학이 의미 없다는 거야

translation.en: everything, now means nothing? It means nothing?
translation.ko: 현실의 모든 규칙들, 수천 년의 과학이 의미 없다는 거야 아무 의미 없다는 거지

translation.en: You wouldn't be cool. You wouldn't be cool if a guy...
translation.ko: 괜찮을 수 없지 괜찮을 수 없는 거야

translation.en: No, you wouldn't. If there was no rules.
translation.ko: - 물론 괜찮지 - 아니, 그렇지 않아 규칙이 없다면

translation.en: You go to put your sneakers on, and they're pumpkins.
You blow your nose, a nickel comes out.
You look in the mirror, your face is a...
I know you're bullshitting. Give me my thing.
translation.ko: 말도 안 되는 소리하네 내 거나 내놔

translation.en: My hands are airplanes so just don't look.
Yeah. Well, get on one of them
translation.ko: 그래 올라 타서 보드 안 타는 곳으로 날라가 버리라고

translation.en: and fly to fucking where guys don't hover.
translation.ko: 올라 타서 보드 안 타는 곳으로 날라가 버리라고

translation.en: What are you doing? That's the death punch.
translation.ko: 뭐 하시는 거예요? 그건 죽음의 동작이잖아요

translation.en: Your death punch is extremely powerful, huh?
-There was five. I took three. -That's not okay.
translation.ko: - 다섯 개 남았네, 세 개 가져간다 - 그럼 안 되지

translation.en: One's a... One's dwarf one, so it evens out.
translation.ko: 하나는 난쟁이만 하니까 억울할 거 없어

translation.en: Sure hope to see you tomorrow night.
Yeah, Trivial Pursuit. I won the last two of those.
translation.ko: 그래, 트리비얼 퍼슈트 해야지 두 번 연속 내가 이겼잖아

translation.en: Did you have a good weekend?
[Andy] The new girl. She said, "How are you?"
[Michael] Oh, God, small talk. How'd it go?

translation.ko: - 끔찍했지, 끔찍했어 - 돌려야지, 공 받아 젠장

translation.en: [Dr. Laurey on phone] Unfortunately, your white blood count is...
Uh-huh. And what are my options?
translation.ko: 네 어떤 선택을 할 수 있죠?

translation.en: [Dr. Laurey] Well, there are a few options.
[Master] You fool! Now you've done it!
You death punched your own master! [laughs]
[Michael] I got it. I got it.
half-time speech if I was a coach. I...
translation.ko: 하프 타임 작전 지시를 할 수 있을걸

translation.en: I really have this best speech I've ever heard at half-time.
translation.ko: 정말로 최고의 작전 지시를 내릴 수 있다니까

translation.en: -[Michael] What is it? -[Andy] I'm working on it.
-I made the shirt. I know it's not-- -You made it about two years ago.
translation.ko: 내가 만든 셔츠잖아 그러니 내가 알지 2년 전인데 아직도 뭔지 기억해?

translation.en: -You still remember what it is? -It was a year and a half ago,
translation.ko: 2년 전인데 아직도 뭔지 기억해? 1년 반 전이야, '기름진 돼지고기'라면 T가 두 개잖아

translation.en: and if it was "fatty pork", there'd be two T's.
translation.ko: 1년 반 전이야, '기름진 돼지고기'라면 T가 두 개잖아

translation.en: There'd be another T right there.
translation.ko: 거기 T가 하나 더 있어야 해

translation.en: It's a "satay fork." Little fork. Little appetizer fork.
translation.ko: 그럼 '꼬치용 포크'로 하자 애피타이저용으로 쓰는 작은 포크 있잖아

translation.en: No, it's not-- Nothing in the kitchen. Get out of the kitchen.
translation.ko: 아니야, 부엌에 있는 건 아니야 부엌에서 나와

translation.en: I'll give you that info, and that's it.
That's a good one. That was a year and a half...
Sort of think... I like that it bothers you.
translation.ko: 네가 싫어할 것 같아서 마음에 들던데

translation.en: Did you eat my cashews? I have no cashews left.
translation.ko: 캐슈너트 먹었어? 난 하나도 안 남았어

translation.en: I could tell you. Want me to tell you?
translation.ko: 말해 줄 수 있는데, 말해 줄까?

translation.en: I saw a second oncologist. He, um...
You know, there's nothing they can do.
The hospital, the tubes, the bloating. I don't want any part of that.
translation.ko: 병원에서 튜브 껴야 하고 배도 부풀어 오르고 나 그런 거 싫어

translation.en: They got a whole process. If you get less than six months they give you this...
translation.ko: 병원에서 이 과정을 도와줘 6개월 미만 시한부이면

translation.en: And you can do it at home.
But I don't want to do it alone and...
I was hoping you would help me out.
You gotta... You can't give up. Huh? You gotta...
You can't do that. Miracles happen, right?
What about the guys who say, "You got six months to live" and...
next thing you know, he's climbing Mount Everest.
Jim Abbott had one arm. Remember Jim Abbott on the Yankees?
translation.ko: 짐 애보트는 팔이 하나였잖아 양키스의 짐 애보트 기억하지?

translation.en: They already gave me the prescription.
They can do that? They can just give you that...
I don't want you to look at me like this.
translation.ko: 날 그런 식으로 안 보면 좋겠어

translation.en: But I was not gonna tell you 'cause I didn't want it to change things, you know?
translation.ko: 말 안 할까도 생각했어, 이 일로 달라지는 게 없으면 좋겠어

translation.en: I want to make some pizzas.
I want to watch some movies.
I want to play some Paddleton.
Should we play the second half?
[Andy] These are all pretty far away.
The places where your doctor said we could fulfill the...
translation.ko: 처방전으로 약 구입할 수 있는 약국들 말이야

translation.en: [Andy] A lot of pharmacies won't fill it 'cause of moral reasons.
translation.ko: 많은 약국들이 도덕적 이유로 약을 취급 안 한대

translation.en: All right, Guess we're gonna do a little road trip.
translation.ko: 알았어, 그럼 자동차 여행이나 하지 뭐

translation.en: What does that mean? Road trip?
You don't just do a road trip, right?
What do you mean, what does that mean?
We'll drive there. We'll get the meds, we'll find a place...
translation.ko: 운전해 가서 약 받고 숙소를 찾아서...

translation.en: Your stove burnt the pizza up. It's burnt.
We can't eat that. We gotta eat something else.
translation.ko: 먹으면 안 돼 다른 거 먹자

translation.en: -[Michael] It's not that bad. -What are we gonna eat?
-Nice work. -Look at that piece of shit!
[Andy] How about the air in the tires?
[Michael] Yeah, I put a bunch in. It's okay.
There's no such thing as too much air.
translation.ko: 공기가 너무 많다니, 그런 건 없어

translation.en: Yeah, but it was too much.
[Andy] Hey, I had some oatmeal so I'm gonna need a bathroom in two hours.
translation.ko: 이봐, 오트밀 때문에 2시간 후에는 화장실 가야해

translation.en: [Michael] But you also had a second coffee, so maybe 90 minutes?
translation.ko: 커피도 두 잔이나 마셨잖아 90분 후에 가야하지 않을까?

translation.en: -[Michael] What do you see? -I see everything.
I see everything. Yeah, I do. There's a tree. There's a...
If you had to live like this...
You could adapt. That's the great thing about the human mind.
translation.ko: 적응할 수 있을걸, 그래서 인간이 위대하잖아

translation.en: [Andy] How many wishes would a genie have to give you where...
one of those wishes would be sand off?
translation.ko: 램프 요정이 소원을 몇 개나 빌게 해줄까?

translation.en: every grain of sand that was on your body fell off.
translation.ko: 몸에 묻어있는 모래알들이 떨어져 나가는 거야

translation.en: No, ten. If they gave me ten, I would do it.
You can only think of nine wishes before you get to sand off?
translation.ko: 9개 소원밖에 남지 않는데 모래 떨기를 소원으로 빈다고?

translation.en: Then a billion dollars, flying, whatever.
Invisible, and then sand off, yeah. Well, pajamas on.
translation.ko: 투명 인가, 그리고 모래 떨기 잠옷 입기도

translation.en: Pajamas... It's late at night, you're tired. "Pajamas on."
translation.ko: 잠옷은... 밤 늦게 피곤하면 '잠옷 입기' 소원을 외치는 거지

translation.en: [Michael] I think there's a buffer. I think we're okay.
Well, not that big a buffer.
What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas.
translation.ko: 최악의 경우가 뭔데? 떨어지면 떨어지는 거지

translation.en: What's the worst case scenario? We run out of gas here, right?
translation.ko: 최악의 경우가 뭐냐고? 여기에서 떨어진다고 생각해 봐

translation.en: Next thing you know, we're drinking our urine.
How do you get from running out of gas, the next step is drinking urine?
translation.ko: 기름 떨어진 거에서 어떻게 소변 마시는 걸로 점프해?

translation.en: We'll call somebody. We'll walk to the gas station.
translation.ko: 전화를 걸어도 되고 주유소까지 걸어가도 되잖아

translation.en: -There's nobody out here. -You go right to drinking urine.
translation.ko: - 여긴 아무도 없어 - 그래도 소변 마시기로 바로 가냐

translation.en: [Andy] It's like Twilight Zone out here.
[Michael] How's that half-time speech coming, by the way?
translation.ko: 그나저나 하프 타임 이야기는 어떻게 돼가?

translation.en: I could sell it. But if I told it to a coach,
translation.ko: - 정말? - 코치한테 말하면 팔 수도 있을걸

translation.en: they'd want to buy it from me.
-[Michael] That's more like it -[Andy] That's the beginning.
translation.ko: - 그거야? 그 내용이야? - 그게 시작 부분이야

translation.en: -[Andy] Who is that? What's that? -[Michael] It's my sister.
She knows about the cancer, but not about the other stuff.
translation.ko: 암에 대해선 아는데 다 말하지 않았어

translation.en: I kind of want to keep that to myself.
She does small talk, your sister?
-I've never seen an ostrich. -I've seen them.
translation.ko: - 타조 본 적 없어 - 난 봤는데

translation.en: -I've seen them on TV. -Yeah, but in person, though.
Yes, it is. Forty miles an hour.
[Michael] Okay, I think we're getting close.
[Michael] Looks like a tourist town or something.
[Andy] A lot of windmills in this town.
We talk to the guy, Phil, and we got a plan, right? Okay.
translation.ko: 필이란 남자한테 얘기할 거잖아 계획 세운 거지, 맞지?

translation.en: This sinus infection is so awful.
-[pharmacist] I know. -And I feel like I...
I feel like this medication I've taken before and it hasn't worked.
translation.ko: 전에 먹은 약이 잘 듣지를 않아요

translation.en: -Have a good rest of the day. -Thank you.
Hi, guys. What can I do for you?
Hi, there. We're here to see Phil.
Phil's not in today. I'm Dave. I'm standing in for Phil.
translation.ko: 필은 오늘 근무 안 해요 전 데이브예요, 대신 근무해요

translation.en: We talked to Phil though. You spoke to Phil.
-Okay. So we should come back. -But I can help you guys.
-This is kind of top secret. -I spoke to Phil. It's a...
translation.ko: - 일급 비밀이라서요 - 제가 필과 얘기했어요, 그게...

translation.en: He was gonna... It's a special medication he was gonna...
translation.ko: 필이... 필이 특별한 약을 주기로 돼있어서요
- 마이클 톰프슨 씨세요? - 네, 제가 마이클이에요

translation.en: You want to call Phil maybe?
It's okay. I can handle it. Yeah.
I don't like that. We should come back for Phil. Let's come back.
translation.ko: 별로야, 나중에 와서 필 만나자, 나중에 오자

translation.en: [Michael] Why are you so obsessed with Phil?
translation.ko: - 왜 그렇게 집착해? - 잘못 처방해 주면...

translation.en: [Andy] What if he puts something wrong in there. Could be dangerous.
translation.ko: - 왜 그렇게 집착해? - 잘못 처방해 주면... 어떡해? 위험할 수도 있잖아

translation.en: Give me one second. I'll get you guys dialed in here.
translation.ko: 잠깐만 기다리세요 처방 내용 확인 좀 할게요

translation.en: All right. How are you guys doing today?
-There are three medicines involved. -We know all this part.
translation.ko: - 세 가지 약이 포함돼요 - 이미 다 알아요

translation.en: This is what we did with Phil. That's why...
If Phil was here he wouldn't say that to us 'cause we already spoke to him about it.
translation.ko: 필이 있었다면 이런 얘기 안 했을 텐데요, 이미 다 한 얘기라서요

translation.en: I understand, but Phil told me I had to read these instructions.
translation.ko: 이해합니다만 필이 설명 드리도록 부탁하고 가서요

translation.en: Okay, so you'll be taking two of these one hour before taking the drink.
translation.ko: 마시기 1시간 전에 이 두 가지를 드세요

translation.en: This one is for nausea. It'll keep you from vomiting.
translation.ko: 이건 구토 약이에요 구토를 막아 줄 거예요

translation.en: And this one ran all the way home.
Um, and in the event of vomiting after ingesting the drink,
the patient should have a family member contact
their referring physician to determine a course of action.
translation.ko: 가족이 담당 의사에게 연락해서 원하는 조치를 결정하셔야 해요

translation.en: is the medicine you'll be taking last.
There are 100 pills in this bottle,
which is the lethal dose. [clears throat]
Can you ring it up now?
-You're not paying for this. -Oh, no. Yeah.
I didn't tell you about this, but here, take the card.
translation.ko: 아직 얘기 못했지만 여기 카드 받으세요

translation.en: -Take the card and ring it up. -Andy, it's $3,500.
I know what it is. I have more money than you.
-I want to do this. -It's a lot.
-[card swipe machine beeps] -I'm sorry, sir. Your card was declined.
It's not declined. You gotta put it through.
translation.ko: 안 될 리가요 다시 한번 긁어 봐요

translation.en: My mistake. I'll give it another shot.
You know that those things glitch a lot.

translation.ko: - 죄송하지만 또 안 돼요 - 카드 주세요

translation.en: -Give me the card. -I'll pay for it.
I'm just gonna call the bank up, that's all.
translation.ko: 은행에 전화하면 돼 한 통이면 된다고

translation.en: -I can pay for it and you pay me back. -Give me your phone.
Give me your phone. Don't ring anything up,
translation.ko: 전화 줘, 아직 계산하면 안 돼요

translation.en: 'cause this'll take one second. I'm gonna call the number right there.
translation.ko: 잠깐이면 돼, 여기 있는 번호에 전화하려고

translation.en: I see the number right there. Give me one second. Don't ring anything up.
translation.ko: 여기 번호 있네, 잠깐만 시간 줘 아직 계산하지 마세요

translation.en: You will have to empty the contents
of all 100 pills into a glass
-and mix them with half a cup of water. -It's Andy Freedman.
translation.ko: - 물 반 컵과 섞으세요 - 앤디 프리드먼이에요

translation.en: The drink will be a little bitter, but you want to drink it all at once.
translation.ko: 약간 쓴 맛이 날 거예요 한 번에 다 드시는 게 좋아요

translation.en: [Andy] It's me, though. What do you want me to tell you?
[Dave] If the patient decides they don't...
want to end their life after ingesting
-to begin lifesaving measures. -[Andy] I'm not yelling.
translation.ko: - 긴급 구명 조치를 시작해야 해요 - 소리 지른 거 아니라고요

translation.en: -I'll stop yelling, but I'm not yelling. -Yeah.
translation.ko: 알았어요, 근데 소리 지른 거 아니에요

translation.en: [Andy] Well, send it then. They're gonna send a code.
That's why you're supposed to have a phone.
I have e-mail. Can I see my e-mail on your e-mail?
translation.ko: 이메일 있어요, 당신 이메일에서 내 이메일 확인할 수 있어요?

translation.en: Uh, Phil has his log-in codes. I don't have it.
translation.ko: 로그인 코드는 필이 관리해요 전 없어요

translation.en: See? Why don't we wait for Phil? Let's just wait for Phil to come back,
translation.ko: 이것 봐, 필 기다리는 게 어때? 올 때까지 기다리자

translation.en: -And none of this happens. -It's gonna be fine
Hold on. I sent you my pet name about five years ago.
Is that it? Are we done?
Yes, yes. Uh, yeah, I read it all.
-Let me just pay for it. I got it. -[Andy] Yeah. Why...
-Where does it go? -He's okay? [Andy] Where does my pet name go?
translation.ko: 그건 어디 갔어요? 내 애완동물 이름은 어디로 갔냐고요?

translation.en: What do you mean? I'm taking a pain pill.
Hi, we have a reservation for...
You're all set. I just need a credit card for incidentals...
translation.ko: 예약 잘됐고요, 보증금에 사용할 신용 카드 주시겠어요?

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna give you a credit card, but if you could wait until the end to
translation.ko: 신용카드 드릴게요 비용 청구하기 전에 기다려주세요

translation.en: do whatever you have to do with it. I'll call the bank,
-and it's all gonna be fine. -Let me just...
[Andy] Okay, you get it. Put it on his card, but I'm paying for it.
translation.ko: 그럼 이 친구 카드로 해요 하지만 내가 계산할 겁니다
다 기록해 둘 거야 내가 다...

translation.en: -I'm gonna pay it all back, okay? -That's fine.
So, guys, I got you, um...

translation.ko: 퀸 침대 두 개 있는 방 드릴게요

translation.en: We have another room with a king.
I'm sorry. Not two rooms. Would you prefer to have a king?
translation.ko: 아니요, 방 두 개가 아니라 혹시 킹 침대를 원하시나 해서요

translation.en: If you feel more comfortable, we're fine with that.
Guess I'll take that then, right?
[Andy] The bag. I'll hold the bag.
Keep it in my house just so we know where it is.
translation.ko: 어디 있는지 알 수 있도록 우리 집에 둘게

translation.en: Just assumed, you know, I'd hold onto it.
I got a safe place in my closet. Up behind the, uh...
translation.ko: 옷장 안에 안전한 장소가 있어 상자 뒤쪽 위에...

translation.en: The Rod Carew rookie card. I got that little...
translation.ko: 로드 커루 루키 카드 말이야 그 작은...

translation.en: I don't think anybody's gonna steal it.
[Andy] Who knows? Sandy got broken into two times and she's on the ground floor.
translation.ko: 누가 알겠어? 샌디네 도둑이 두 번이나 들었잖아 걔도 1층에 살잖아

translation.en: They always go to the ground floor first.
I'm up on top. If the water main breaks...
over on Hillside and then it floods, I'm up top.
translation.ko: 힐사이드에 물이 새면 범람하잖아 난 2층에 살잖아

translation.en: I slept for a long time, sorry.
Now we got nothing to worry about.
-All right, very funny. -[Andy] It was my idea.
It's not funny. That's a good idea.
Where's the medication? Where is it?
It's locked up. We don't got to worry about any of that stuff we were talking about.
translation.ko: 금고에 넣었어 이제 아무 걱정 안 해도 돼

translation.en: Andy, I don't want to play a game right now.
-Can you give me the code? -No, just don't worry about it.
translation.ko: - 암호 알려줄래? - 아니, 그냥 걱정하지 마

translation.en: [Michael] Maybe we should try getting a drink.
[woman] Uh, the sign-up list is still open.
Honestly, if you don't want to do anything, it's just gonna be more of me.
translation.ko: 원하시는 분 없으시면 저 혼자 계속합니다

translation.en: I think I'm gonna start drinking.
Yeah. I mean, it's not good for you, but it is good.

translation.ko: - 하프 타임 이야기 말이야? - 그래, 하프 타임 이야기

translation.en: It's not ready yet. I don't want to jinx it.
translation.ko: 아직 준비 안 됐어 징크스는 사양할래

translation.en: I stumbled on something that's really gonna be something.
translation.ko: 뭔가 떠올랐는데 꽤 괜찮을 것 같아

translation.en: You think I'm lying about that? Why would I lie about it?
translation.ko: 내가 거짓말하는 것 같아? 왜 거짓말하겠어?

translation.en: Remember that time you told me you spoke Spanish and then...
translation.ko: 전에 스페인어 한다고 했었잖아 기억나? 그런데...

translation.en: I over-exaggerated how much I knew,
but that's because I was trying to impress you. We weren't friends yet.
translation.ko: 잘 보일려고 그런 거야 친구가 되기 전이었잖아

translation.en: Do me a favor, guys. Close your eyes.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어 봐, 눈을 모두 감아

translation.en: I want you to close your eyes.
Everybody, close your eyes. I want you to picture something.
translation.ko: 모두 눈을 감고 내가 말하는 걸 떠올려 봐

translation.en: We're gonna lose this game, guys.
Just listen to me. I'm not gonna lie to you.
translation.ko: 내 말 들어, 거짓말은 안 할게

translation.en: No matter what I say here, that ain't gonna turn it around.
translation.ko: 내가 뭐라고 말하든 전세를 뒤집을 순 없을 거야

translation.en: But so what? I'm proud of you.
I'm proud of you. I don't want to wait to the end
translation.ko: 너희들이 자랑스러워 경기가 끝날 때까지 기다리면

translation.en: when you're hurting to say that. You guy's are...
translation.ko: 말하기 힘들 테니 지금 말할게 너희들은...

translation.en: You're gonna have good lives. You're all good guys. You're gonna...
You're gonna be something in your life.
Murphy, you're gonna be in the Navy, right?
You're gonna be a hero one day.
You're gonna live somewhere... You're gonna live in Connecticut somewhere.
translation.ko: 어딘가에 살 거야 코네티컷 어딘가에 살 거야

translation.en: And you'll have a drinking problem maybe, but that makes you a better writer.
translation.ko: 술 문제가 있지만 그거 때문에 더 좋은 작가가 되지 않겠니

translation.en: You're gonna have great lives, and maybe you're gonna have a...
a little empty feeling in your gut.
And maybe when you lay at night, secretly you're gonna think...
translation.ko: 밤에 누으면 살며시 이런 생각이 들지도 몰라

translation.en: This is all good, but if I could ever go back...
translation.ko: 지금도 다 좋지만 그때로 돌아갈 수 있다면

translation.en: If I could go back in time I would go to the day we lost that big game
translation.ko: 패했던 그 중요한 경기가 있던 그날로 돌아갈 수만 있다면

translation.en: and I would play that second half over again."
Well, guess what guys? Open your eyes! You're back!
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 눈 떠 봐 너희들 다시 돌아왔다!

translation.en: -Okay, now I got it. -[man] Oh, there he is.
translation.ko: - 됐어, 이제 다 됐어 - 이제 오네

translation.en: He was alone. Nobody likes to be alone. I invited him.
translation.ko: 혼자 있길래, 초대했어 혼자 있고 싶은 사람은 없잖아

translation.en: Okay, all right. So, now you're over here now?
-Yeah, have a little-- -Get out of my seat.
[Michael] No, you stay. You sit. Andy, take my seat.
translation.ko: 아니, 거기 계세요, 여기 앉으세요 앤디, 내 자리에 앉아

translation.en: So, David was telling me he's a kung fu fan.
Oh, yeah. Of course. You're that too.
-All right. -Yeah. I like kung fu. You like kung fu?
Well, have you watched Death Punch?
Not a lot of fighting in it, you know, but...
It's a kung fu movie. It's not about fighting.
translation.ko: 쿵후 영화예요 싸움에 대한 게 아니라고요

translation.en: It's learning about what's inside yourself.
translation.ko: 자신의 내면에 무엇이 있는지 알아보는 영화라고요

translation.en: -You didn't see that? -I... Well, you know...
translation.ko: - 그 점을 못 봤다는 말이요? - 전... 그게...

translation.en: I saw it on YouTube. Maybe I missed some parts. So, you know...
translation.ko: 유튜브에서 봐서 놓친 부분이 있는지도 몰라요

translation.en: The sign-up list is still open.
[Andy] How can you see it on YouTube? You can't see it on YouTube.
translation.ko: 유튜브에서 봤다고요? 유튜브에서 보면 안 되죠

translation.en: I don't mean to be, uh... [grunts]
How can you find it on DVD?
You can find it on DVD. You can find it on a VHS.
I recommend watching it on VHS.
-Because that's how it's meant to be seen. -Hi, everybody. My name's Michael.
translation.ko: - 그렇게 봐야 제대로 본다고요 - 안녕하세요, 전 마이클이에요

translation.en: I want to honor a movie called Death Punch.
translation.ko: 데스 펀치라고 하는 영화에 헌사를 받치고 싶어요

translation.en: It's my favorite movie in the world.

translation.ko: 제가 가장 좋아하는 영화예요 아무도... 본 사람이 없죠, 사람들에게 늘 권하지만 안 보더라고요

translation.en: We're always trying to get people to watch it, and they don't.
translation.ko: 본 사람이 없죠, 사람들에게 늘 권하지만 안 보더라고요

translation.en: Um, it's hard to find, but it's very important to me.
translation.ko: 찾기 어렵지만 제겐 아주 중요한 영화예요

translation.en: in the mountains. His moves are graceful and powerful,
He's attacked by the Master Liu.
And a great battle ensues and...
And Liu winds up for what will become known as the Death Punch.
translation.ko: 루는 데스 펀치라고 알려진 동작을 하게 되죠

translation.en: Chien and he hits the barrel because...
Sorry, I told it wrong. I shouldn't have...
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 틀렸네요 그렇게 말하는 게 아니...

translation.en: but you think they're enemies and that's why it's funny when he hits the barrel
translation.ko: 적이라고 생각하게 돼요, 그래서 루가 통을 칠 때 웃긴 거예요

translation.en: because you think that it's, um...
I kind of messed that up, sorry. But back to the story.
translation.ko: 또 망쳤네요, 죄송해요 다시 얘기로 돌아가죠

translation.en: The water starts to jiggle, and Chien sees it and he says,
translation.ko: 물이 흔들리기 시작하고 첸이 그걸 본 다음 말하죠

translation.en: But, anyhow, this is kind of where you have to see the movie.
translation.ko: 어쨌간 그래서 이 부분은 영화로 봐야 해요

translation.en: Anyway, it's a cool shot because the barrel starts to shake, right?
translation.ko: 통이 흔들리기 시작하는 장면은 아주 멋져요

translation.en: It's rumbling. It's going crazy and...
And suddenly, the barrel explodes with water.
If I had landed that punch, your fate would have been sealed.
translation.ko: 내가 그 펀치를 날렸다면 네 운명은 끝났을 거야

translation.en: Three steps in any direction, and your heart would explode.
translation.ko: 어느 방향으로든 세 발자국 가면 네 심장은 터질 거야

translation.en: Chien, he's stubborn and he learns the Death Punch anyway, by himself.
translation.ko: 첸은 고집이 세고 여하간 데스 펀치를 독학으로 배워요

translation.en: Alone he learns it. On the hill without a shirt on.
translation.ko: 혼자 배우죠, 언덕에서 셔츠도 입지 않고요

translation.en: -Yeah, that part where he trains. -[Andy] Right.
translation.ko: - 그래, 그 훈련 장면 말이지 - 맞아

translation.en: Ku Woo Tai shows up with 15 ninjas.
Yes, and put him in a chokehold.
[Michael] Here you go. You avoid it.
-What have I done? -Do you see what happens?
translation.ko: - 내가 뭘 한 거지? - 지금 이거 봤어요?

translation.en: Smells though, right? Does it smell a little? Like meat.
translation.ko: 냄새나지 않아? 약간 냄새나지? 고기 냄새 같아

translation.en: What do you mean you smell meat?
-We're in a pot like soup. -I don't smell it.
translation.ko: - 국 안에 들어와 있는 것 같아 - 냄새 안 나는데

translation.en: Let's get some people in here.
I'm gonna go to the bar. I'm gonna get the open-mic girl,
translation.ko: 술집에 가서 오픈 마이크 했던 그 여자애 데려올게

translation.en: and I'm gonna get David. -Oh, no. -Go get your friend David.
I almost killed that guy, and he said, uh...
translation.ko: 아까 걔가 말했을 때 죽일 뻔했어

translation.en: I'm sorry, I was just trying to...
-Oh, it's not your fault. -No, I was, you know...
translation.ko: - 네 잘못 아니야 - 아니, 내 말은...

translation.en: Duck. Duck, duck, duck. Get under water.
No, we're... You don't want to see...
[receptionist] You guys are so adorable. You know that?
translation.ko: 두 사람 너무 귀여워요 그거 아세요?

translation.en: I mean, like from the very first moment,
when you checked in, we could really feel that you were totally in love.
translation.ko: 두 사람이 사랑에 빠져있다는 걸 느낄 수 있었어요
- 그런 친구들 좋아하긴 해요 - 모두 아름답죠

translation.en: -[Michael] We're neighbors. So... -[Andy] We're just neighbors.
-with the rest of the world. -And it's great.
It was such a strong thing that we just assumed.
translation.ko: 그런 느낌이 강해서 우리가 그렇게 추측했네요

translation.en: Oh, so we... Okay, we're not wearing clothes, so we're...
translation.ko: 아, 그럼 우리가... 알았어요, 옷을 안 입고 있어서...

translation.en: He got naked so I got naked. That's the only reason I got naked.
translation.ko: 이 친구가 벗어서 저도 벗은 거예요, 그게 다예요
- 남편은 어디 있어요? - 바로 여기 있어요

translation.en: -What do you mean? -What do you mean he's right here?
translation.ko: - 무슨 말이에요? - 바로 여기 있다니 무슨 뜻이죠?
투명 인간 뭐 이런 거 아니죠?

translation.en: He passed away a few years ago.
Yeah. We ran this place together for a long time, and he's here.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 이곳을 같이 운영해서 같이 있는 거나 마찬가지예요

translation.en: Sorry, I'm just bad at small talk. I've never been good at it.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 이런 대화를 잘못해요 늘 서툴렀어요

translation.en: -I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable. -I hate it.
translation.ko: - 불편하게 만들 생각은 없었어요 - 저도 싫어요
저도 수다 떠는 거 너무 싫어요

translation.en: I work in an office, and that's all they do.
translation.ko: 사무실에서 일하는데 사람들이 하루 종일 수다 떨어요

translation.en: -Yeah. I don't like it. -[receptionist] So stupid, right?
I keep trying to think of some kind of better opening conversation line.
translation.ko: 어떻게 대화를 시작하면 좋을까 생각하려고 애써요

translation.en: I've been worrying about how to really do it. Something like...
You want to talk? If you don't, it's okay.
And now I'm gonna go over here.
All right, I'm gonna hit the hay, guys.

translation.ko: - 안 되죠, 가긴 어딜 가세요 - 어딜 가는데?

translation.en: -We just got started... -I gotta get some rest.
translation.ko: - 이제 막 시작했는데... - 난 좀 쉬어야 해

translation.en: Okay, well, we have to go.
-You don't have to come. You can stay. -No, I'm gonna go.
translation.ko: - 넌 올 필요 없어, 여기 있어 - 아니, 갈래

translation.en: -I'm gonna go, too. -I'm just gonna go sleep in the room.
translation.ko: - 나도 갈래 - 그냥 방에 가서 자려는 거야

translation.en: -You have to be quiet. -[receptionist] You go.
translation.ko: - 자네 조용히 해야 해 - 당신은 가고...
- 그래요, 전 갑니다 - 안 돼, 마이크

translation.en: I don't have a key, though. I don't have a key.
It's okay. I got a lot of keys.
You got a lot of them in the...
'Cause we're over here and he's over there, right? [chuckles]
translation.ko: 우리가 여기 있고 당신 남편은 저기 있고, 그렇죠?

translation.en: Yeah, well, he's always with me.
-Why'd you wake me up? -Why are you screaming?
translation.ko: - 왜 깨우고 그래? - 왜 소리를 질러?

translation.en: You looked like you were dead.
[Andy] Hey, Michael, I need an aspirin or something.
translation.ko: 이봐, 마이클 아스피린 같은 것좀 줘

translation.en: My head. I got... I was a little drunk.
-Did you see the guy-- -[Michael] Hey, good morning.
translation.ko: - 이 사람 본 적... - 친구, 잘 잤나?

translation.en: What are you... You're over here?
Yeah. I was looking at the fire. I was waiting for you to get up.
translation.ko: 자네가 일어나길 기다리면서 불 보고 있었어

translation.en: -I thought we'd get some pancakes. -Oh, you're watching the fire?
translation.ko: - 팬케이크나 먹으러 갈까 해서 - 불 보고 있었다고?

translation.en: Yeah, you ever just watch a fire?
translation.ko: 그래, 불 바라 본 적 없나?

translation.en: -So nice. -Yeah. You should've woke me though.
-You okay? What's wrong with you? -All right. Whatever.
I'm all right. I'm hungry, that's all.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 배 고파서 그래 그게 다야

translation.en: What do you want to do?
I went outside. I thought you were down there.
I went down the block. I saw...
I saw a bunch of people, you know?
-All right. Let me go to the room. -I want pancakes. All right.
What do you mean, "What're you doing"?

translation.ko: - 자네가 아침에 가져갔잖아 - 이건 내 거라고

translation.en: You bought the safe, but the medication is mine.
translation.ko: 자네가 금고를 샀지 약은 내 거잖나

translation.en: -No, I bought the medication, too. -That's the important part.
translation.ko: - 아니, 내가 약도 샀어 - 그게 중요한 부분이야

translation.en: -I didn't say... -You tried to buy it.
translation.ko: - 내 말은 그게 아니라... - 자네가 사려고 시도는 했지

translation.en: -I swiped the card. -I didn't say I'm paying for it?
translation.ko: - 내 카드로 긁었어 - 내가 낸다고 안 했다고?

translation.en: -You said you were. -We have a witness.
You said it. But I'm the one whose...
-Whose bank account got charged? -Oh, so I lied?
I'm paying for it. It's mine.
I'm gonna hold it, that's all.
You're running away from me? Give me the...
What, are you chasing me? You're chasing me.
I'm not chasing you. You're walking.
translation.ko: 잡으려는 거 아니야 자네가 돌고 있잖아

translation.en: Stop moving around the table. Stop moving.
translation.ko: 테이블 주위로 돌지 말라고 그만 돌아
- 내가 그런 게 아니고... - 그만해, 바보 같잖아

translation.en: I got the bad knee. You know I got the bad knee.
translation.ko: 나 무릅 안 좋잖아 무릅 안 좋다고

translation.en: You know I'm gonna catch you if you want me to.
-Andy! Andy! -I'll tell you right now, I won't stop.
I don't know why you're making a big deal out of it.
-I'm the dying guy. -All right. Shut up with that.
-You're being a stupid idiot. -I'm being stupid? I'm the dying guy.
translation.ko: - 바보 같이 굴고 있어 - 내가 바보 같아? 난 죽고 있어

translation.en: -I know you're the dying guy. Stop. -I'm the dying guy!
translation.ko: - 죽고 있다는 거 알아, 그만해 - 난 죽고 있어

translation.en: Thirty-two dogs. Twenty of them ate cats.
-The code is one, two, three, four? -See? You're not that smart.
translation.ko: - 암호가 일, 이, 삼, 사라고? - 봤지? 자젠 별로 똑똑하지 않아

translation.en: through all of this. I just can't.
[grunts] Your stove is still acting stupid.
I think I might have burnt it a little on the bottom, but I think it's okay.
translation.ko: 바닥이 조금 탔을지 몰라 그래도 먹을 만해

translation.en: They're still fighting here? There's more fighting in this than I remember.
translation.ko: 아직도 싸우는 거야? 싸우는 장면이 이렇게 많았었나?

translation.en: Your friend Dave would love it.
I'll get it in a sec.
Chien, when you woke this morning,
did you think it would be for the last time?
-[Andy] Can I open them? -Biggest surprise of your life.
You still got cancer that's killing you?
Feels like there's a little more.
It doesn't all come, you know?
[laughs wryly] You don't have to sit in here if you don't want to.
It sounded like you got all of it out, though.
The one from the gas station is River Kickers.
Which way to the ancient healer?
I want to go when I feel good. I don't want to go when it's hurting.
translation.ko: 상태가 좋을 때 갔으면 해 아플 때 가고 싶지 않아

translation.en: Yeah, but it's not gonna stay that way. You know, I'd like to do it when I feel...
translation.ko: 그래, 계속 이렇지는 않을 거야 기분이 괜찮을 때 하고 싶어

translation.en: I should have took off from work. You know, I should have took off.
A month ago. We could've done more stuff.
translation.ko: 한 달 전에 냈으면 더 많은 걸 했을 텐데 말이야

translation.en: I wish I had done that.
You know, go back... Go forward in your life
translation.ko: 되돌아 보면... 원하는 인생을 살도록 해

translation.en: and imagine where you are and if you had a chance--
translation.ko: 지금 위치에서 상상해 봐 만약에 기회를 가진다면...

translation.en: You're my best friend. I know you.
translation.ko: 자넨 가장 친한 친구야 내가 널 알잖아

translation.en: Also, I heard you practicing it through the vent about 100 times.
translation.ko: 네가 연습하는 소리를 환기구 통해서 100번은 들었을걸

translation.en: You seem really good right now. You know, you seem like...
I don't even know if you had to buy this particular pill.
translation.ko: 꼭 이 약을 사야 하는 건지는 모르겠어

translation.en: A hundred of anything, really, would...
I wonder if they do that...
-You're spilling it on the side now. -Oh, sorry.
Well, sorry. We got to go back now, right?
-You never told me that? -I never told anybody that.
translation.ko: - 근데 한 번도 말 안 했어? - 아무한테도 말한 적 없어

translation.en: I used to feel so bad about it.
I left her. It was awful.
"Oh, I know I need to be alone.
I'm convinced. That's what I need to do. I need to be alone."
translation.ko: 그게 내게 필요한 거라고 확신했어 난 혼자 있어야 해

translation.en: And then I ended up here...
and you were looking at this apartment
-when Barry was showing it to you... -Yeah.
Yeah, I didn't want you to get it.
Yeah, I mean, I didn't know you were gonna be a cool guy and everything.
translation.ko: 그러니까 내 말은 이렇게 괜찮은 녀석인지 몰랐다는 거야

translation.en: I told Barry you look like one of those guys...
translation.ko: 내가 배리한테 그랬거든 네가 뉴스에 나오는...

translation.en: you know, you see on the news. He's got a...
He's got a freezer full of hands and feet.
I told Barry, I said, "Eh, why don't you keep looking?"
I've seen people look at me like that in...
translation.ko: 라이트 에이드 같은 곳에서 사람들이 날 그렇게 쳐다 보더라고

translation.en: -People look at me like that all the time. -Yeah.
translation.ko: - 사람들이 나도 항상 그렇게 봐 - 그래

translation.en: Oh, God. We gotta deal with this.
I mean, it's now or never, so...
I'll just tell you if you want.
I don't think you're gonna like it though.
-Why would you do that to me? -Because when we do puzzles...
translation.ko: - 왜 그런 건데? - 알아맞히기 할 때마다

translation.en: it's a lot of work and...
And there's a finish. There's something real you can finish.
translation.ko: 하지만 끝이 있잖아 뭔가 끝낼 수 있는 거라고

translation.en: I know, but you always look sad when we'd finish.
translation.ko: 알아, 근데 끝내려고 하면 네가 항상 슬퍼 보여

translation.en: -I don't look sad. No, I don't. -You always look a little sad.
You don't see it. I see it.
We're happy, we're done, we got it.
translation.ko: 재미있게 맞추다가 결국엔 답을 알게 되지

translation.en: And then you get a little sad. I thought, "You know what?
translation.ko: 근데 네가 조금 슬퍼 보여서 생각했어, '이렇게 하면 어떨까?'

translation.en: This will be his favorite shirt."

translation.ko: - 또 고백할 건 없어? - 응, 없어

translation.en: I thought you were a killer. I...
gave you a shirt with no answer.
Come on, that's the last one. We got to...
"Fill the glass with four ounces of water."
It's bitter, so you're gonna drink it all at once.
-And then a few minutes later... -I remember that part.
translation.ko: - 그리고 몇 분 후에... - 그 부분 기억나

translation.en: The yellow one is for anti-vomiting.
That's the thing. If you vomit this up then it's all for nothing.
If you take it and then...
I don't want that. I want to be in my head.
translation.ko: 그건 필요 없어 머리로 느끼고 싶어

translation.en: -All right, I'll keep this. -I don't need that but I'll take this.
translation.ko: - 필요 없지만 내가 가지고 있을게 - 알았어, 내가 가지고 있을게

translation.en: Takes an hour. After you take that pill...
I got to wait an hour after?
You got to wait an hour for that to take effect, yeah.
All right, we should have taken...
[Andy] Let me go... Hold on. Hold on.
-Go ahead. -Tell me when you swallow it.
Now, so we just wait an hour?
Hmm. You got to wait an hour.
Yeah, you should feel free to sell the car.
I don't think you should be driving, anyway.
I do think you should keep my phone though.
-Nah, I don't want it. -What do you mean, "nah"?
Don't you think it's time you get a phone?
You don't get e-mail right? You can't get e-mail on it.
translation.ko: 이메일도 못 받잖아, 그렇지? 그 휴대폰에선 이메일도 못 받아

translation.en: [Andy] There's nothing wrong. I'll keep it. I just want a good one.
translation.ko: 문제는 없어, 내가 가질게 그냥 좋은 게 필요해

translation.en: [Michael] You don't even know how to do e-mail on a phone.
translation.ko: 휴대폰에서 이메일 사용하는 법도 모르면서 뭘 그래

translation.en: -You don't know what you're doing. -It comes with instructions, right?
-What are you doing? -I'm smelling a tree.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 나무 냄새 맡아
- 전에 맡아 본 적 없어 - 벌레들이 있어

translation.en: What's it gonna do to me now?
translation.ko: 그래서 벌레들이 지금 나한테 무슨 해라도 끼치겠어?

translation.en: I don't know. There's a lot of larvae and stuff on there.
There's something I do want to talk to you about that...
I don't think you're gonna like...
and I could somehow contact you...
You know, like the woman in the hotel. She hangs out with her husband, you know.
translation.ko: 호텔에서 그 여자처럼 말이야 그 여자는 남편이랑 항상 있다잖아

translation.en: She's saying what she feels. You don't mean real. I mean, that's...
translation.ko: 느끼는 대로 말하는 거지 실제로 그렇다는 건 아니잖아

translation.en: -That's just in movies and stuff, right? -But on the...
This is a tough one for me.
-I don't know. -I could send you a signal.
translation.ko: - 모르겠어 - 네게 신호를 보낼 수 있을 거야

translation.en: Push the water glass a little bit or...
-leave you a note in the foggy mirror... -No. No, don't do that.
translation.ko: 수증기 낀 거울에 메모를 남기는 거 말이야 싫어 - 그렇게 할게 - 아니, 하지 마

translation.en: No, no. Do not do that.
No moaning through the vent. No, "woo."
You know, you did now. Now I'm just gonna think anything weird...
translation.ko: 지금 네가 한 말 때문에 조금이라도 이상한 일이 있으면

translation.en: I'm gonna think it's you. The wind, it's you.
translation.ko: 너라고 생각하게 될 거잖아 바람이 불어도

translation.en: Let's just pick something right now, so I know everything else...
translation.ko: 뭔가를 정하는 게 낫겠다 지금 정하자고, 그래야 나머지 것들은...

translation.en: That's what I was getting at in the first...
I guess we could do it on the couch. I mean, I'm here.
translation.ko: 그냥 소파에서 할까 봐 그러니까... 지금 여기 있으니까

translation.en: I mean, that makes sense, right?
-It's our spot. -It's our place, right? Yeah.
I don't want to do it on the couch.
If I was on the floor, I'd be closer to the door.
I don't want to do it on the floor.
You all right? You want me to...
I want to do it in here.
-Should I lay down? -You wanna lay down?
I'm starting to... I'm shaking a little bit.
Yeah, you don't have to be scared. I think it's gonna be okay.
I think everything's gonna be okay.
-[cries] I'm scared. -I don't think you gotta get scared, Mike.
translation.ko: - 나 무서워 - 두려워 하지 마, 마이크

translation.en: I think it's gonna be okay.
[cries] I shouldn't have taken the pill.
-It's gonna be okay. All right. -[cries] Okay.
Yeah, I know. 'Cause I know. I got a feeling.
I got a feeling, man. I got a feeling about this.
Oh, my God. I'm already-- Give me your hand. Hey.
I want to tell you I love you.
I'm gonna close my eyes now, okay?
See you down the road, friend.
Uh, yeah. We're moving into C.
-[woman] So you are in what apartment? -[Andy] I'm in F.
-[woman] Hey, thank you so much. -All right. Yeah.
You got the best apartment, actually.
Oh. You hear that? Best apartment.
You're lucky, actually, that you got this one.
You can answer him. Tell him.
He doesn't have to. I'm Andy.
So, I guess you like games then, Evan, huh?

translation.ko: 그냥 게임이에요 패들 볼 같은 건데...

translation.en: but you gotta imagine this whole wall here, right?
translation.ko: 그냥 게임이에요 패들 볼 같은 건데... 여기에 벽이 있다고 상상해야 해요 알겠지?

translation.en: You hit a ball against it.
And you got to get it into a barrel that's over here.

translation.en: We put a barrel right there.
And, uh, it doesn't sound like a lot of fun, but it is.
It's good. It's fun. Yeah. I'll show you one day.
I got a great football half-time speech, too.
